channel.title: Answers to lifes greatest questions
channel.description:
...Google.
Before you ask this isn't spam.
Well lets get started. People at my school always say; "Oh dave, he is that guy who is really good with computers, he can fix any problem with them."
Sure i probably can fix alot of computer problems, not all of them ofcourse. But how did i learn how to fix computers? I didn't and i feel [b]i'm being wrongly branded.[/b]
So lets say mr X has a problem with his computer, i immediatly type the symptoms into google and viola we have everything we need.
It wasn't me, it was google for christ sakes. I really wish normal people (e.g. like the people in my school) would use their initiatives and just attempt to get the answer from google, or another search engine. Is it so hard?
Well... any of you guys feel the same way?
[mods please feel free to do anything with my thread]

item.title: Answers to lifes greatest questions
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

You’d be surprised, I’ve seen people go to google, “ok… what do I do now?”

Some people are just that stupid.

Read full topic

item.title: Answers to lifes greatest questions
item.dc:creator: @cant_touch_this93 cant touch this93
item.description:
@cant_touch_this93 wrote:

[quote=“Gotta Catch Them All, post:14, topic:109083”][quote author=MastrChief link=topic=156087.msg1468763#msg1468763 date=1181598241]
Google is too complex for a lot of people though.
[/quote]

How? You gotta type then click, real complicated.[/quote] exactly…

Read full topic

item.title: Answers to lifes greatest questions
item.dc:creator: @alex4ever alex4ever
item.description:
@alex4ever wrote:

[quote=“MastrChief, post:11, topic:109083”]It sucks to be the only one who knows wtf everybody’s talking about in class, when everyone else is like “omg wtf is that? the computer it too smart for me, so i have no clue what i’m talking bout”, and its something ultra simple. You just want to get up, punch their teeth in and be like “Dude stfu and learn this sh*t! You aren’t sent to school to get more retarded!”[/quote]i wish they would to just tell them to shut up and go to google

Read full topic

It sucks to be the only one who knows wtf everybody’s talking about in class, when everyone else is like “omg wtf is that? the computer it too smart for me, so i have no clue what i’m talking bout”, and its something ultra simple. You just want to get up, punch their teeth in and be like “Dude stfu and learn this sh*t! You aren’t sent to school to get more retarded!”

item.title: Answers to lifes greatest questions
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Meh so what. I hate people at my school who think they are amazing at computers because they know a tiny bit of html, or know how to downgrade a psp. It’s like who the hell cares/can’t do that?!

For example; There is this boy who bums computers but frankly is crap at them and he goes to me all smug “I think I’m gonna go code some HTML”

  1. Thats so simple to learn.
  2. Why are you telling me like im going to be impressed.
  3. WTF how nerdy are you to go on about HTML at school.
  4. Your not my friend go away.
  5. Five!

Ty :P, also davidude i think your bragging about the fact that your the computer kid at your school. Why would you brag about that?

Read full topic

item.title: Answers to lifes greatest questions
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

Kamu:

You’ll get over it.

We are scarred for life.

Read full topic

item.title: Answers to lifes greatest questions
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

xerxes.jpg952×844

ya…thats not related

I have to fix all my familes comps and ipods and shit…
I WANT TO PLAY GAMES NOT FIX SHIT!!!

every other kill in FEAR it seems I am asked to do something…and teacher at my school gave up on trying to stop me from playing starcraft lol

Read full topic

Uhh same thing with me. Teachers pretty much beg me for my help.

item.title: Answers to lifes greatest questions
item.dc:creator: @haxed haxed
item.description:
@haxed wrote:

Happens to me all the time. It appears I’m the only competent computer user in the whole school. And the fucking staff have to get me to fix there computers. If I don’t they screw me over. What makes me feel wrongly labeled is when I get on the net and speak to all these people that seem to know everything and go back to school and i’m one of those people.

Read full topic
